body: On activity yes. But the difference is I'm just a tryhard with nothing better to do (because I'm not good at anything). Most people who show their face around here are literal savants at almost every single endeavor (because they're the ones with things worth sharing) and being just an average smart guy around all them doesn't make me feel very good.

body: I am literally the only person here who isn't good at even one thing despite having intense special interests. Most of them are amazing at tons of things, and [this user](https://ruqqus.com/@sfrohne) for example is damn near perfect in *every* single aspect, even if barely beginning to dabble at something. It's not an inferiority complex lol. I can't truly be alone, chance would dictate that my situation is true of the vast majority of people, yet I never see any of them online. And I suppose it's because we have nothing interesting to share like those savants so the rest just lurk and don't bother posting.

author.bio: Welcome to censorship. Ruqqus is a bag of smashed assholes. I advise taking your business elsewhere. Discussions.app and preview.goatpen.co actually embrace free speech.

body:
Horseshit. 


In my experience we were all created to be good at something. You've strengthened my personal connection with God more than just about any parishioner ever has.

Most of what you do regarding Christianity/the Bible is light-years over my head. Don't sell yourself short, kid. You're a whole lot more intelligent than you realize; and a lot of the average ruqqies aren't all you give them credit for.
